duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of complex embedded software in C/C++ on bare metal/firmware.
Design and implement tools and algorithm prototypes in Python.
Analyze and resolve technical challenges using knowledge of physiology and digital signal processing.
Serve as a Lead Software Engineer for complex software development projects.
Research and implement algorithm solutions for functional requirements.
Provide technical assessments in areas of expertise and new software designs.
Assist design engineering with component datasheet review and schematic design review.
Participate in project leadership and program planning.
Contribute to advanced technical research on new technologies.
Offer process improvement suggestions and author new procedures.
Provide reliable solutions to difficult problems using sound problem-solving techniques.
Contribute to algorithm design for transforming biomedical sensor data into impactful metrics.
Assist in bringing up new sensors on an embedded platform.
Maintain proficiency in designing well-architected software systems and modules.
Utilize GIT, JIRA, compilers, debuggers, and build systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, or related field AND a minimum of 5 years relevant experience OR an equivalent combination of education and experience. Master's preferred.
